chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m0 := L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x) in Iter (MF.f m0) i z = Iter (MF.f m) i z

Premises:
dart = nat : Set
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
B = fix B (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B m0 k x) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
Md0.k = zero : dim
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
bottom = fix bottom (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else bottom m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y (bottom m0 k0 z) then bottom m0 k0 x else bottom m0 k0 z else bottom m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
f = fun f : family => let (ind, f0, _) := f in f0 : family -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ R_scope R_scope] f is a coercion
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
top = fix top (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else top m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x (top m0 k0 z) then top m0 k0 y else top m0 k0 z else top m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0%nat => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
Module MF : Sig Definition f : fmap -> dart -> dart. Definition f_1 : fmap -> dart -> dart. Definition exd_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z <-> exd m (McF.f m z). Definition exd_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z <-> exd m (McF.f_1 m z). Definition bij_f : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (McF.f m). Definition bij_f_1 : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (McF.f_1
Iter_cF_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in Iter (cF (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x))) i z = Iter (cF m) i z
MF.unicity_mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (j k : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MF.Iter_upb m z in (j < p)%nat -> (k < p)%nat -> Iter (MF.f m) j z = Iter (MF.f m) k z -> j = k
MF.Iter_f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (i j : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> (j <= i)%nat -> Iter (MF.f_1 m) j (Iter (MF.f m) i z) = Iter (MF.f m) (i - j) z
MF.between = fun (m : fmap) (z v t : dart) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exists i j : nat, Iter (MF.f m) i z = v /\ Iter (MF.f m) j z = t /\ (i <= j < MF.Iter_upb m z)%nat : fmap -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
expf_B0_CS_1_a_prel1 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let p := MF.Iter_upb m x_1 in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in xb0 = Iter (cF m) j x_1 -> (i <= j < p)%nat -> expf (B m zero x) x_1 z
expf_B0_CS_1_b_prel1 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in let p := MF.Iter_upb m xh0_1 in let z := Iter (cF m) i xh0_1 in x0 = Iter (cF m) j xh0_1 -> (i <= j < p)%nat -> expf (B m zero x) xh0_1 z
between_expf_B0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let p := MF.Iter_upb m x_1 in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in ~ expf m x0 xb0 -> (i < p)%nat -> expf (B m zero x) x_1 z
MF.expo = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (exists i : nat, Iter (MF.f m) i z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
nc_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m0 := B m k x in let m1 := L m0 k x (A m k x) in nc m1 = nc m
A_L_B_top_bot_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let k1 := dim_opp k in A (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k1 z = A m k1 z
cA_1_L_B_top_bot_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let k1 := dim_opp k in cA_1 (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k1 z = cA_1 m k1 z
cA_L_B_top_bot_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let k1 := dim_opp k in cA (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k1 z = cA m k1 z
A_1_L_B_top_bot_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let k1 := dim_opp k in A_1 (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k1 z = A_1 m k1 z
MF.Iter_upb_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := MF.Iter_upb m z in Iter (MF.f m) nr z = z
cF_1_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cF_1 (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) z = cF_1 m z
cF_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cF (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) z = cF m z
cA_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k z = cA m k z
cA_1_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA_1 (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k z = cA_1 m k z
between_expf_B0_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in let p := MF.Iter_upb m xh0_1 in let z := Iter (cF m) i xh0_1 in ~ expf m x0 xb0 -> (i < p)%nat -> expf (B m zero x) xh0_1 z
ndZ_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in nd m1 = nd m
ne_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in ne m1 = ne m
nv_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in nv m1 = nv m
inv_hmap_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> inv_hmap (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x))
MA0.Iter_f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (i j : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> (j <= i)%nat -> Iter (MA0.f_1 m) j (Iter (MA0.f m) i z) = Iter (MA0.f m) (i - j) z
expf_B0_CS_2_b_ind : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> exd m z -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in ~ expf m x0 xb0 -> let t := Iter (cF m) i z in ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m xh0_1 z -> expf (B m zero x) z t
MA0.between = fun (m : fmap) (z v t : dart) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exists i j : nat, Iter (MA0.f m) i z = v /\ Iter (MA0.f m) j z = t /\ (i <= j < MA0.Iter_upb m z)%nat : fmap -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
A_1_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> A_1 (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then nil else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then top m k x else A_1 m k z)
A_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> A (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then nil else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then bottom m k x else A m k z)
eqc_B_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> eqc (B m k x) (A m k x) (top m k x)
top_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart) (H : inv_hmap m), succ m zero x -> exd m z -> x <> z -> let m0 := L (B m zero x) zero (top m zero x) (bottom m zero x) in top m0 zero z = (if MA0.expo_dec m x z H then x else top m zero z)

```coq
From Coq Require Import Nat.

(* Goal *)
Theorem goal : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart) (i : nat), 
  inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m0 := L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x) in 
  Iter (MF.f m0) i z = Iter (MF.f m) i z.

(* Proof *)
Proof.
  intros m k x z i Hinv Hsucc.
  rewrite <- Iter_f_f_1 with (m0 := L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) (i := i) (z := z).
  simpl.
  rewrite A_L_B_top_bot with (k0 := k) (x0 := x) (z0 := z).
  rewrite cF_L_B_top_bot with (m0 := L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) (k0 := k) (z0 := z).
  rewrite cA_L_B_top_bot with (m0 := L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) (k0 := k) (z0 := z).
  simpl.
  rewrite <- Iter_f_f_1 with (m0 := L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) (i := i) (z := z).
  simpl.
  reflexivity.
Qed.
```
